DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics single ascend dos AZD8848 healthy subject .
DOC.detailed_description: A Double-blind , Placebo-controlled , Randomised Study Investigate Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics Single Ascending Inhaled Doses AZD8848 Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy men woman age 18 45 year ( inclusive ) suitable vein cannulation repeat venipuncture . Women childbearing potential must stable highly effective contraceptive method least 3 month prior Visit 1 ( screen ) willing continue choose contraceptive method Male subject willing use condom ( spermicide ) prevent pregnancy drug exposure female partner refrain donate sperm father child day investigational product administration 3 month Have body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 weigh least 50 kg 100 kg Ability produce sputum good enough quality assessment biomarkers Abnormal vital sign , 10 minute supine rest , define follow ( SBP > 140 mmHg , Diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) > 90 mmHg , Heart rate < 40 > 85 beat per minute ) Prolonged QTcF > 450 m shorten QTcF < 340 m family history long QT syndrome History severe allergy/hypersensitivity ongoing allergy/hypersensitivity , judge Investigator history hypersensitivity drug similar chemical structure class AZD8848 History additional risk factor Torsade de pointes ( e.g. , heart failure , hypokalaemia , family history Long QT syndrome , sudden death ) History asthma allergic rhinitis
